name: Don't Rage Quit 2
description:
Don’t Rage Quit 2 is an action game that will test your skills of not rage quitting!

The player avoids obstacles and tries to reach the goal. What makes this very difficult is the constantly changing controls! Every few seconds, the controls are completely randomized. One moment the player might be going down but fall off the next moment because of going left.

If you rage quit, you fail, so try to not rage quit!
